gameplay.description:
Aftershock

An Aftershock hits 10 seconds after an Earthquake. For every point in the Scale, Aftershock deals 33% Attack as physical damage. 10% chance to Stun the opponent for 1.5 seconds.

Aftershock Stun Duration and Accuracy goes up by 7% for every point in the Aftershock Scale.

Inflicts Concussion, reducing the opponent's Ability Accuracy by 32.5% for 5 seconds when the Aftershock Scale is higher than 4 points.

1.note: Adds 2 points to the Aftershock Scale.
1.name: Compression Wave

2.note:
Adds 3 points to the Aftershock Scale.
